def.dt: :having the main axis or a main part perpendicular upright freezer
:marked by strong moral rectitude an upright citizen

entry.pt: upright honest just conscientious scrupulous honorable mean having or showing a strict regard for what is morally right. upright implies a strict adherence to moral principles a stern and upright minister. honest stresses adherence to such virtues as truthfulness, candor, fairness known for being honest in business dealings. just stresses conscious choice and regular practice of what is right or equitable workers given just compensation. conscientious and scrupulous imply an active moral sense governing all one's actions and painstaking efforts to follow one's conscience conscientious in the completion of her assignments scrupulous in carrying out the terms of the will. honorable suggests a firm holding to codes of right behavior and the guidance of a high sense of honor and duty a difficult but honorable decision.

def.dt: :the state of being upright :perpendicular a pillar out of upright
:a football goalpost usually used in plural
:a piano with vertical frame and strings compare grand piano
